about.title: About
about.description: Artificial Intelligence and Cybersecurity Researcher, with expertise in IoT and Cloud environments. Proven skills in machine learning, data analysis, and intelligent system design. Oriented towards applied and theoretical research, with the ambition to contribute to scientific advancement and the development of adaptive security solutions for distributed systems.

summary.name: Wael Ghazel
summary.description: AI-driven Business Analyst and AI Researcher (PhD Student). Expertise in deep learning, cybersecurity, and data engineering. Skilled in bridging business needs with advanced technical solutions.

items.title: Business Analyst
bullets: Providing expertise and cost estimation for processing requirements.
Developing and managing API connections between company products and partner systems.
Testing new product extensions to ensure quality and proper functioning.
Configuring the product according to client requirements.
Assisting clients by diagnosing, debugging, and resolving issues.
Creating dashboards to support clients in informed decision-making.
Working with databases for data management and optimization.
Developing LLM- and RAG-based solutions for automated extraction and generation of business documents.

items.title: Business Intelligence Intern
bullets: Designing a data warehouse and developing ETL pipelines to consolidate multiple data sources.
Developing BI tools to track and manage team projects with dynamic dashboards.
Automating data collection, cleaning, and preparation scripts with Python.

items.title: Mining Quality Prediction Using Machine & Deep Learning
Python for Data Visualization: Matplotlib & Seaborn
TalentParse
items.description: AI-powered web application for intelligent recruitment. Extracts key info from CVs using Gemma3 (Ollama) for scoring and matching.

items.title: AE-RAE
